content.html: I've received DM's & emails over the last few days from +- 60 people who've had negative experiences with @coderinheels Experiences from MF, other conferences, & many small communities I didn't hunt these out. It was entirely passive. It felt like opening a floodgate a sample
content.value:
I've received DM's & emails over the last few days from +- 60 people who've had negative experiences with @coderinheels 

Experiences from MF, other conferences, & many small communities

I didn't hunt these out. It was entirely passive. It felt like opening a floodgate

a sample

photo.alt: Just to say I’ve been warning whoever I could about this person for a while. Truly one of the worst experiences of my life involved them.

content.html: I’m still receiving messages. I’ve heard accounts of bullying, people facing legal hurdles, blackmail, malicious reputation damage, and a young girl self-harming due to harassment. Please I am begging you. Enough. Do not let her hide behind “altruism” anymore.
content.value:
I’m still receiving messages.

I’ve heard accounts of bullying, people facing legal hurdles, blackmail, malicious reputation damage, and a young girl self-harming due to harassment.

Please I am begging you. 

Enough. 

Do not let her hide behind “altruism” anymore.
